title: The Effect of Skin Pigmentation on the Accuracy of Pulse Oximetry in Infants with Hypoxemia.
abstract: To compare pulse oximetry measurement bias between infants with hypoxemia with either dark skin or light skin with Masimo Radical 7 and Nellcor Oximax. There was no significant difference in systematic bias based on skin pigment for either oximeter.
